          <title>
            <string language="en">Series and parallel circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Serie und parallele Stromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Série et circuits parallèles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Série e circuitos paralelos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Serie e circuiti paralleli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σειρές και παράλληλα κυκλώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Serie y circuitos paralelos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These circuit diagrams show two light bulbs connected in series (left) and connected in parallel (right) to a cell.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">components</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulbs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parallel circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">series circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltage source</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Schaltpläne zeigen zwei Glühlampen, die in
der Serie angeschlossen werden (nach links) und in der Ähnlichkeit 
(angeschlossen sind recht), die an eine Zelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces schémas de circuit montrent deux ampoules 
reliées en série (à gauche) et reliées en parallèle (droit) à 
une cellule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas de circuito mostram dois bulbos 
claros conectados em série (à esquerda) e conectados na paralela 
(direita) a uma pilha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi circuitali mostrano due lampadine 
collegate in serie (a sinistra) e collegate parallelamente (di destra)
ad una cellula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα κυκλωμάτων εμφανίζουν δύο 
ελαφριούς βολβούς που συνδέονται στη σειρά (αριστερά) και το 
συνδεδεμένο παράλληλα παράλληλο (δεξιά) με ένα κύτταρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos esquemas circulares muestran dos bombillas 
conectadas en serie (a la izquierda) y conectadas en el paralelo 
(derecho) con una célula.</string>
          </description>
